original_text: Then the man took me to the north gate. He measured it. It was the same size as the other gates, 36 with rooms for the guards, their walls and an entrance room with windows. The whole entrance was 25 metres long and 12½ metres wide.
korean_text: 그가 또 나를 데리고 북문에 이르러 측량하니 크기는

sentences.original_text: Then the man took me to the north gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 사람은 나를 북문으로 데려갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: It was the same size as the other gates,
their walls and an entrance room with windows.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 벽과 창문이 있는 입구 방이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The whole entrance was 25 metres long
